result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ عَمِلُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ ثُمَّ تَابُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهَا وَءَامَنُوٓاْ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهَا لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
result.translation: 153. uma taamoomi abe maray tet abceniik lakal sarra Yallal gaceeh yeemenek, diggah ku Rabbi too usun aben toobah lakal dambi cabti-li xuwaw-li kinni.
